name: Bitext
tag_list: text-analytics, natural-language-processing, semantics, sentiment-analysis, business-inteligence, contextual-advertising, semantic-search, natural-language
overview: Bitext has developed NaturalOpinions, an application which is able to detect the topic and extract the sentiment, either positive or negative, about particular product features or brand names. Business Intelligence solutions, based on any media source, traditional media (digital press) or social media (FaceBook, Twitter, etc) can thus be easily implemented with Bitext’s language technologies. Bitext runs a public demo of NaturalOpinions that reads and categorizes opinions from Twitter on brands like iPhone, iPad or iPod: www.naturalopinions.com NaturalOpinions is based the most powerful and flexible technology available in the field of Natural Language Processing: a rule-based approach to parsing content that integrates morphology, syntax and semantics. NaturalOpinions is available in English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Dutch, Catalan, Basque and Galician.

milestones.description: Bitext added Casper Davies as Director of Strategic Development
